metadata.title: CVE-2009-3603 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the SplashBitmap::SplashBitmap function in Xpdf 3.x before 3.02pl4 and Poppler before 0.12.1 might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.  NOTE: this issue reportedly exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2009-1188.

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.2-2.1ubuntu1').
